Key: (Sorry, Reine-san. I... can't pick up the phone.)
Translation: (Lo siento, Reine-san. Yo... no puedo coger el teléfono.),

Key: (I'm making Kotori a priority here.)
Translation: (Estoy haciendo de Kotori una prioridad aquí.)

Key: Was that okay...?

Yeah. You finally spoke your mind. All I want
is to be with you right now, Kotori.
Translation:
Sí. Finalmente dijiste lo que pensabas. Todo lo que
quiero es estar contigo ahora mismo, Kotori.

Key: Shido...

Kotori, you're not alone anymore. I won't
let you.
Translation: Kotori, ya no estás sola. No te dejaré.

Key:
Same here... Shido, I'll make sure you're
never alone.
Translation:
Lo mismo digo... Shido, me aseguraré
de que nunca estés solo.

Key:
(We hugged each other tightly. By doing so,
it felt like we were communicating on a deeper
level.)
Translation:
(Nos abrazamos con fuerza. Al hacerlo, parecía que
nos comunicábamos a un nivel más profundo).

Key:
(Since then, our relationship changed. Not
drastically. But it reaffirmed our sibling
closeness. I was her brother, she was my sister.)
Translation:
(Desde entonces, nuestra relación ha cambiado. No
drásticamente. Pero reafirmó nuestra cercanía entre
hermanos. Yo era su hermano, ella era mi hermana).

Key:
(However, though we never said it aloud,
something changed inside of us. So long as
Kotori's beside me, it'll never die.)
Translation:
(Sin embargo, aunque nunca lo dijimos en voz alta,
algo cambió dentro de nosotros. Mientras Kotori
esté a mi lado, nunca morirá).

Key: Hey, Shido.
Hm?
What should we do now?
Hm. Look at the time. We could eat dinner.
Translation: Hm. Mira la hora. Podríamos cenar.

Key:
I'll treat you to a deluxe fast food meal since
you love it so much.
Translation:
Te invitaré a una comida rápida de
lujo ya que te gusta tanto.

Key: YAY! Just what I wanted, Shido!
But that doesn't tickle my fancy anymore.
Translation: Pero eso ya no me hace ninguna gracia.

Key: Haha. Fair enough. We could get something else.
Translation: Jaja. Me parece justo. Podríamos conseguir otra cosa.

Key: On second thought, I'll eat it.
You're never honest with yourself.

What? Besides, what if people see me scarfing
it down?
Translation: ¿Qué? Además, ¿y si la gente me ve devorándolo?

Key: I mean, who cares what you eat, Kotori?
Translation: ¿A quién le importa lo que comas, Kotori?

Key: Wh-What are you saying?!
Hahaha...

(It was a peaceful time. I don't know what
happened, but no more Spirits appeared.)
Translation:
(Fue una época tranquila. No sé qué pasó,
pero no aparecieron más Espíritus).

Key:
(Ratatoskr accomplished its mission and was
disbanded. Kotori withdrew from her post.)
Translation:
(Ratatoskr cumplió su misión y se disolvió.
Kotori se retiró de su puesto).

Key:
(Which meant we had more time for ourselves.
All the fun and chaotic memories faded away,
and soon years had passed...)
Translation:
(Lo que significaba que teníamos más tiempo para
nosotros. Toda la diversión y los recuerdos caóticos
se desvanecieron y pronto pasaron los años...).

Key: (At last, we had time for ourselves.)
Hey, Shido?
Yeah?
Are you happy?
Of course I am.
Ah, glad to hear it.
What the heck? Why do you ask?
Oh? Feeling curious?
Yes, I am.
Then, let me explain...

(Honestly, it didn't matter. All that mattered
was that we were happy.)
Translation:
(Sinceramente, no importaba. Lo único que
importaba era que fuéramos felices).

Key: We'll always be together.
